metadata.title: CVE-2019-6460 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in GNU Recutils 1.8. There is a NULL pointerdereference in the function rec_field_set_name() in the file rec-field.c inlibrec.a.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6460` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

librec1 - 1.8-1ubuntu0.20.04.1~esm1
recutils - 1.8-1ubuntu0.20.04.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: recutils package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8-1ubuntu0.20.04.1~esm1').
